document_data.name: Hobgoblin
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hobgoblin language''' was the racial language of [[hobgoblin]]s, a race of [[goblinoid]]s.
document_data.Speakers: Beyond hobgoblins themselves, Hobgoblin was to varying extents a common secondary language among [[bugbear]]s,<ref><ref> [[flind]]s,<ref> [[gnoll]]s,<ref><ref> [[goblin]]s,<ref><ref> [[orc]]s,<ref> and [[half-orc]]s.<ref>

Derivations.Koalinth: A rather unusual sounding{{Cite dragon/250/Heroes of the Sea|29}}{{Cite dragon/68/Featured Creatures|39}} [[koalinth]]s.
Derivations.Northern Wastes: The hobgoblins of the [[Northern Wastes]] spoke a dialect of Hobgoblin that was similar to, though distinct from, that spoken in [[Faer√ªn]].<ref>

document_data.Related Languages: Hobgoblin was among the languages that [[Trollspeak]] commonly loaned words from.{{Cite organized play/LC/Monster Mash|23}}{{Cite organized play/LC/The Quest for Fire|15}}
